data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 11,090 believers in Chuuk that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Chuuk, Micronesia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 11,090 believers find a person of peace today among the 37,610 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.section_summary: On average, 7 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Chuuk, Micronesia.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Chuuk, Micronesia.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Chuuk, Micronesia.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Japanese people might believe through him.
God, we pray for the believers in Chuuk, Micronesia to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Lord, teach the young people in the state of Chuuk to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Chuuk, Micronesia to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

location.name: Chuuk
location.cities_list: Weno, Nema, Satowan Village, Lukunor Village, Pulap Village
location.cities_list_w_pop: Weno (13,856), Nema (995), Satowan Village (955), Lukunor Village (927), Pulap Village (905)
